Scroll of the Monk. I will worship you forever!

I love you. In a totally platonic way. The Exalted 2e book I wanted most is now available! Thank you so much! :)

You´re welcome!
If you´re looking for any other Exalted book, just ask and I´ll upload. Or any other RPG or martial arts material.
